summary: A 38 year old American novelist discovers the difficulties of being married to a British 16 year old schoolgirl.
cast: Charles Bronson|Orson Bean|Honor Blackman|Michael Craig|Paul Ford|Jack Hawkins|Trevor Howard|Lionel Jeffries|Kay Medford|Robert Morley|Susan George|Peggy Aitchison|Tony Arpino|Eric Barker|Erik Chitty|Sheila D'Union|Judith Furse|Marcia Garton|Cathy Jose|Anthony Kemp|Sue Lloyd|Barney Martin|Ruth Masters|Nina Monique|Annette Montgomery|Mark Robbins|Leslie Schofield|Anne Sheward|Debbie Slater|Jack Somack|Derek Steen|Jimmy Tarbuck|Norman Vaughan|Gordon Waller|Ann Way|Stephanie White|Polly Williams|Doy Young|Melanie Marlene-Ilysa|Jack Armstrong|Mel Churcher|Victor Harrington|Jill Ireland|Gerry Judge|Reg Lever|Elspeth March
title: Twinky
